subject: Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
Thank you, Bruce. Will do.

And I'll be glad to report back, fruitful or not.

Lance

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> Well Lance!
>  
> I guess the gauntlet has been thrown!
>  
> do your best
>  
> Bruce
> 
> Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team 
> 
> 
> To: EVP-ITC@...: orbhunterx@...: Tue, 4 Dec 2007 03:41:44 
+0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I'll take that as a challange, Bruce!After proper burn in time, to 
attune the Box to me, I will go forth.I plan to take it to several 
places that I know spirits dwell. We shall see through experimental 
questions what is what...Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce 
halliday <paranormalinvestigating@> wrote:>> Frank,> > After doing 
box research for a while now and having the opportunity to work with 
several different> types of boxes. I would have to agree the boxes 
are meant for and work better as a stationary communication device > 
sort of like a communication station that is consistently under the 
same basic conditions. I have never taken my boxes out of my home> or 
done a session out side of my home and I don't believe that taking 
the box , any box not just yours to a remote allegedly haunted 
location> will not serve to enhance communication. And if anyone is 
really concerned about summoning dark entities they have a much 
better chance> of that communicating with a grounded and maybe 
disgruntled or confused entity at a haunted location.> > so I agree 
with your assessment of box use 100%> > Bruce> > Bruce Halliday 
Paranormal Investigating Team > > > To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com; 
hauntedtimes@: franks-boxes@: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 14:43:43 -0700Subject: 
RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?> > > > > 
This 'negativity' is bad enough, I wouldn't even want it on the group 
except Moon is the one that says everyone else, me and the group 
included, gets only 'false communcation' or 'bad guys', and that's 
from his own friggin' blog, I didn't make that up, or pull it out of 
my butt. So it effects us all, and I think is open for 
discussion/comment knowing this will get forwarded back to him. In 
fact I'll cc Moon this posting. When he says all these scan radio 
users, that means me to, since I use the things, and I prefer the 
linear scan mode. What I say about the box use is completely 
disregarded, and what I get through the box, myself, as The Box 
Maker, is minimalized by Moon. Moon puts my name out there connected 
with his so called 'telephone to the dead', and I very much 
disapprove of my name being applied to an unauthorized use of my 
equipment. I don't give a crap what he gets through the boxes, or 
does with it, but don't make it look like I designed it specificaly 
as the 'telephone to the dead', I designed it as a friggin' ITC 
device, that is capable of two way communication--SOMETIMES, it's not 
like it's a guarenteed connection, and you can't just dial up anyone, 
anytime, that's an exageration! The "box" was intended by me to be 
used in a fixed location, just by taking it to a GHU, or 
an "investiigation" is using it in a way I did not intend, and I 
still say it's better if used in one place. All guide lines I have 
offered for box use are completely ignored, not just by Moon, to be 
fair. It has been shown that many different approaches work for this 
communcation, I suggest Moon design and build his own 'telephone the 
dead' and leave my name out of it. Frank-S> > > Connect and share in 
new ways with Windows Live. Connect now! > > > > > > > >
